Past members

Sanggyu

Introduction

BEATWIN was a five-member boy group under Elen Entertainment (formerly Heavenly Stars Entertainment). Originally a six-member group, they debuted on January 6, 2014 with the single "EXCLUSIVE".

On July 16, 2015, an article revealed that Sanggyu had left the group.

In September 2017, it was announced that members Yoonhu and Seongho had departed from the group. Only three months later, on December 22, 2017, it was revealed that Jungha also left the group.

BEATWIN presumably disbanded in December of 2017 as only Seonhyeok and Yeongjo were still in the group and their SNS stopped being active at that time.
